comment: If you can take Dr. Steppe for pathophysiology, do it! He is so animated and well spoken. This is a difficult course but I enjoyed learning under Dr. Steppe.

he is honestly one of the best nursing professors. for patho, take him! he will help you if you ask questions and really care about your grade! he will take the time to thoroughly explain content and his lectures are great!

I actually enjoy going to his lectures so much! You walk out understanding what you need to know for the test. HANDS DOWN best patho professor. He's funny and is so knowledgeable. Take his class if you can!

Professor Steppe is extremely intelligent and respectable. He is the best lecturer I have ever had and breaks down every topic to give his students the best understanding. He incorporates relevant and useful examples throughout and keeps the class interactive and engaged through survey questions. Patho isn't easy, but Steppe made me love it.
